intro: Physaria sinuosa, commonly known as the zigzag monkeyflower, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It belongs to the family Brassicaceae, which includes mustard and cabbage plants. The plant is characterized by its distinctive zigzagging stems and showy yellow flowers. It thrives in dry, open habitats such as grasslands and rocky slopes. Physaria sinuosa is often found in disturbed soils and is adapted to arid environments.
